person.persName: John A. Goodson (Covington, Kentucky, retired farmer)

body.p: Covington, Kentucky, retired farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Esther Goodson. Father of Lizzie Goodson and John Goodson. Retired farmer in Covington in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Ward 2, p. 103.
